dcterms:creator: Lieve Macken
Bram Vanroy
Luca Desmet
Arda Tezcan
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of an English novel and three Dutch translations: machine translation generated by DeepL, post-editing version, and revised version. The dataset includes 578 aligned segments (7,921 source words; 9,419 source tokens) from the first chapter of the book.
dcterms:title: Literary Translation Dataset
